sec.p: From 20 sites, 150 (27%) weavers out of 580 sampled birds were infected with Plasmodium spp.; only 4 sites had no infected birds. 524 mosquitoes were caught from 16 sites, with 345 (66%) caught at Strandfontein (STR). Mosquitoes trapped did not vary significantly between sites, after analysis including data from STR ( F 1, 24 = 0.07) and excluding STR ( F 1, 24 = 0.27).
